website_summaries.verdict: The Epson EX5220 Wireless XGA 3LCD Projector has average image quality and a good range of ports, including one that fits either a USB thumb drive or the included Wi-Fi adapter.
cons: Image quality, though solid, is unexceptional

customer_reviews.title: the wireless on this is not like adding an apple product
customer_reviews.text: the wireless on this is not like adding an apple product. it's convoluted, you will need a disk drive, and a network admin. we used this in our company and it basically took over our corp access point and shut everyone out of the network. we will take another pass at setting up. it's amazing to me that a company like Epson can ship a wireless product that was outdated in 2010. external usb thumb-drive, cd rom, and it still gets configured incorrectly. also - it has a weird metric thread (4mm?) instead of the standard 1/4x20 tripod mount. it's teeny but seems to hold the load. image seems good, i like the outside physical controls for keystone and focus.
customer_reviews.author: D. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright picture
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright picture, crisp xga quality videos, have both horizontal and vertical keystone and yes you can use in day light without any problem. Somehow I was not enjoying it as a pure movie projector. Biggest flaw I felt about this unit is, no output for audio from the projector and I was not happy with outside projection area was bright and very big. But again, these are not major issue to complain about. Given the price, one of the best bright n clear projector. It can be used for conference and meeting without any issue. Epson are always great with this job
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EPSON 3000 lumens projector!
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement projector for our training room, we did a recent remodel and wanted to get away from the projector at the front of the tables deal. I read some of the reviews and decided this would fill the bill for us. And fill the bill it did, as it was much brighter and clearer than our old one. The colors are bright and vivid, overall we probably do not even need to close the blinds anymore. Have not tried the wireless function as of yet as it is hard wired with HDMI and VGA as well. Works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Tony H.

customer_reviews.title: Great color and functionality.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The color is great, the adjustments are easy to use, and the wireless function (with the included wireless dongle) works great. The one regret is the wireless dongle. I thought I'd be fine using the dongle in lieu of model up with built in wireless, and I am, but there's no secure place to store the dongle. Since this projector has to be portable I have to remove the dongle every time it's moved or stored. I worry I'm going to lose the dongle every time. This isn't the fault of the projector but I think if I had to do it again I'd pay the little extra and get a projector with the wireless built in.
customer_reviews.author: Tech-Steel

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good picture quality with WIFI connectivity which is awesome to have the laptop away from the projector.
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far - only had it for 3 months but performs well, quick to warm up (less than 1 min) and wifi connectivity is well recieved in our Toastmasters District for presentations and Key Notes. Overall very satisfied and clarity is very good. Epson rates these 3000 lumens for BOTH - color and white. Others rate 3000 lumens for WHITE ONLY, so take care to research reviews online.
customer_reviews.author: Eurotall

customer_reviews.title: And what a great decision it was
customer_reviews.text: I have done a lot of research on projectors and decided on this one. And what a great decision it was. Arrived on time and was a great price . The picture is great, had to call tech support once due to mounting it from the ceiling and could not flip the picture tech support was great. This was the first refurbished item I have ever bought so was nervous. But once I opened the box you would have though it was brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey Madness

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for church
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use at church. I needed something that would show bright in a well lit room. This projector did not disappoint. I was excited about the wireless feature but ended up being disappointed with it. It works but only as a mirror of your computer whereas I need it to be a second screen. Microsoft and Apple both have wireless display adapters that cost about the same as the difference in this model and the one without wireless. Other than that I completely satisfied with the result I get from this projector.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Greer

customer_reviews.title: projector
customer_reviews.text: Average to below average projector for cost; quality, connectivity, for type of projector. Had to purchase additional hardware to mount. Connecting is not very easy and requires download or software install. Not recommended for any video in presentation via wireless connection. Does not stream well. Good for on screen slide show yet not high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nick H.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It serves its purpose very well. The wireless connection does not work easily, but with some persistence it will function. The wireless function is only good for sharing static documents like powerpoints or keynotes. Live streaming DOES NOT work with this model.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiSA

customer_reviews.title: Very intuitive interface, very sharp colors. My first ...
customer_reviews.text: Very intuitive interface, very sharp colors. My first time using an Epson projector for a 30-person conference I was putting together. My earlier arrangements had fallen through and I had to get this delivered over night. I had no time to read the instructions. I plugged the projector to my laptop, followed the prompts and everything just worked! Now I plan to use it for movies till my next conference.
customer_reviews.author: newyorker

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend this to a friend
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our church...I have not used it personally but the church has and the picture is very clear...it exceeded my expectations. I would definitely recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: kd bowen

customer_reviews.title: Great projector, this is my first experience with projectors
customer_reviews.text: Great projector, this is my first experience with projectors, but I know quality when I see it. I am sure you can buy a better projector, however for the money you won't be disappointed in this one trust me.........
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! Just got this early this morning and I installed it letter in the evening as I was at work and I was completely amazed. Call of Duty : Modern Warfare 3 looks incredible on my 80 inch projector screen and the colors are awesome! Watched Netflix on it and I felt like at the movies. My New Ex5220 projector +Boss speakers + my 65 inch to 80 inch projector screen are the perfect combination. :-) I highly recommend this product. From a true Gamer and Movie buff. Enjoy! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Internalize the wifi capability
customer_reviews.text: Works just like the box describes. Could be improved by internalizing the wifi ability instead of having a clunky adapter that takes up a usb port.
customer_reviews.author: honest_and_accurate

customer_reviews.title: Nice Projector
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Nice compact size but does not look like a toy, very quiet compared to our old projector. Used in court for trial. Clear picture, very bright, works for us. Bought the 3 year extended warranty and got $100 off because it's refurbished. The right price for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii Gal

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love this projector! We bought it for our church and it works great. Even though refurbished its in excellent condition. Toiled over spending the money but glad we did. Worth every penny. Brightness: GREAT (works well in a dark room, almost offensively bright lol) Sound: This was a big factor for me. Very good volume enough to be heard clearly in a room with a capacity of about 40 people. Came with a nice carrying case and everything. VERY PLEASED
customer_reviews.author: Darian Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for NFL and movie night with the family
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. Projected on a flat wall roughly 8' by 10' and sat about 10' away. Great for NFL and movie night with the family! Also hooked up the the pc but having icons as big as my head was a little creepy!?!?!
customer_reviews.author: scott hcer

customer_reviews.title: The screen is fantastic. The wireless is just about useless
customer_reviews.text: This was an upgrade from an older model. The screen is fantastic. The wireless is just about useless. The saving grace is that I do not use the wireless system. If that is your prime feature requirement you will want to reconsider purchasing this unit.
customer_reviews.author: JEV

customer_reviews.title: ... searches for the source of the video which is great! The brightness is a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: It automatically searches for the source of the video which is great! The brightness is a disappointment. I expected 3,000 lumens to be brighter.
customer_reviews.author: King Watcher

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended..
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for my son, he loves it he plays his video games and watch movies. Our movie nights have gone to another level. The projection is clear and sharp, we just throw it on a large white wall. Highly recommended....cheaper than a new TV.
customer_reviews.author: Ja ckie

customer_reviews.title: Tight and Bright
customer_reviews.text: Super bright. Compact, loaded with features. It is only wireless via a included wifi dongle, nit internal to the machine itself. Not that big of a deal for me right now. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Chaplain America

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use but have been unable to connect to my network. It's probably just me.
customer_reviews.author: Skyclemons

customer_reviews.title: (READ THIS FIRST) BEFORE BUYING !
customer_reviews.text: Good quality projector, but I can't have the volume above 4 / 10 because it starts to make a rubbling/high buzzing noise which is SUPER ANNOYING ! so I cannot use the volume to it's full potential.. not even half what it can actually produce. Super disappointed. Will be writing to Amazon soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Reiners

customer_reviews.title: Picture is beautiful! Set-up without prior video/film/IT knowledge would be a ...
customer_reviews.text: Picture is beautiful! Set-up without prior video/film/IT knowledge would be a bit tricky. Definitely need an added sound system for the full home theatre experience. Glad to have a new way to enjoy movies at home.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Lynn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: REALLY DOES THE TASK AT HAND
customer_reviews.text: NICE MACHINE AND QUALITY PRODUCT. EASY TO OPERATE AND USE EVEN WITH A THUMB DRIVE. NO COMPUTER NEEDED FOR PRESENTATIONS
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: certainly does the job for under 500$ with good resolution.
customer_reviews.text: certainly does the job for under 500$ with good resolution...nice that u can use a flash drive with the USB port to show slides/photos....not very many projectors have that...no need to hook up laptop
customer_reviews.author: denner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality image, but noisy fan.
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed everything about this projector except for the fan noise. In our company's conference room the noise was a real disturbance and a background drone that became annoying after a long day. After several days of dealing with the noise we ended up returning the projector. Here's hoping the next one is a bit quieter.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Piper

customer_reviews.title: Love the Wireless
customer_reviews.text: It what I expected and would order it again. I have only had it less than a month and have only used it about a dozen time, loved the wireless connection works perfectly at home or at another wifi location. I did need some help with setting it up at first but the support team was very helpful
customer_reviews.author: Pat Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. We use it in our church and we have purchased many projector through the years and this one is by far the best picture quality projector we have gotten.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: it would be awesome. Picture is
customer_reviews.text: If i could figure out the wireless, it would be awesome. Picture is steller
customer_reviews.author: Chad The Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Very good projector for our conference room.
customer_reviews.text: This projector gets used in our conference room everyday. Takes a lickin and keeps on tickin.
customer_reviews.author: jfrazier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved this projector. We used it a lot to show family pictures
customer_reviews.author: Blondel Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very good value.
customer_reviews.text: Use in the sanctuary of our church, which has lots of windows, and it works fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: learning more all the time, very uesfull by so many devices.
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and quality for the price. We have mounted in ceiling of our church and it is working perfect.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: The picture is great. The wireless option is very clunky and only ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture is great. The wireless option is very clunky and only useful for presentations. Also, there is no audio out on the device.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cope

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, bright, crisp, hooked it up with one cord and started working immediately. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Quality, cheap, functional. Done
customer_reviews.text: Would get five stars if it had a monitor out jack. This unit is 4/3screen ratio and is nice and bright Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kentola

customer_reviews.title: Not working perfect
customer_reviews.text: the projector doesnt turn on and we get a bliking red or blue light
customer_reviews.author: Ratan S.

customer_reviews.title: Setting this up wireless is not easy
customer_reviews.text: The projector works fine when connected using a cable. Didn't come with the correct wireless key, and the instructions for wireless stink
customer_reviews.author: Victor Gonsalves

customer_reviews.title: Bad cable port
customer_reviews.text: Something was wrong with the HDMI cable port; wouldn't hold the cable in tightly. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: A nice addition
customer_reviews.text: The Epson is hanging from my library ceiling, works as expected and has added a service in my library which I truly appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: C. Casey

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to set it up every time you turn it on.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this projector specifically for its wireless capability, but this projector doesn't remember all its network settings. It keeps reverting to "Quick" settings.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector, Wireless setup very cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Excellent projector, no issues with it, works great. Cons: Configuration to work wirelessly is very cumbersome. Need to download drivers, configure them, etc. Do not expect plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Catdaddy

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this deal!
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal. This was a huge upgrade over our last model, works perfectly for spreadsheets.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Little

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product is listed as "wireless" when in fact it is not. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue P.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked Epson projectors due to their picture and video color quality.
customer_reviews.author: SeaGolfer

customer_reviews.title: Sound is bad too but I knew this going in
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is there is only 1 hdmi port and that's not even a huge deal. Sound is bad too but I knew this going in. Surround sound was always going to be needed so be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great projector for the price. Brilliant colors and sharp focus.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Harris

customer_reviews.title: happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first projector. After little bit research on projectors I bought this one. Received in good condition like new and works cool. I can connect to projector from anywhere and in bright rooms also the screen looks good. I'm happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great projector
customer_reviews.text: I use this projector for my CWP classes weekly. Works great in a well-lit room.
customer_reviews.author: Lockdown

customer_reviews.title: This is working really well for me. I use ...
customer_reviews.text: This is working really well for me. I use it each week to teach a class. I have used an older projector before. The Epson is very bright and clear and quiet. It fits my needs in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie A Barber

customer_reviews.title: Works well great. Set up was easy except for the WI-FI
customer_reviews.text: Works well great. Set up was easy except for the WI-FI. The Set up for the Wi-Fi required a small screwdriver and was too bothersome to set.
customer_reviews.author: Donna T.

customer_reviews.title: other than that we liked.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to configure the wifi, other than that we liked.
customer_reviews.author: LoreGtz

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: This was an outstanding purchase especially for the price... I love this product...
customer_reviews.author: JRbaCANO

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT - DEFINITELY WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: A FANTASTIC PRODUCT. EASY TO USE; HIGHLY PORTABLE AND STURDY. PERFECT FOR SCIENTIFIC PRESENTATIONS.
customer_reviews.author: LFK

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: A good trusted friend who has purchased 3 of these has referred this specific model to us. We are pleased to have our first.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Everett

customer_reviews.title: Projector image is great, but the wifi is very questionable
customer_reviews.text: Projector image is great, but the wifi is very questionable. It does not handle video at all, but works great for a presentation otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Tech Coordinator

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: If you were hoping for a projector with front legs, you don't want this unit. I was very surprised to note that there weren't any when mine arrived. I assumed it was a mistake, so I returned it only to get another one without front legs. So, I had to prop up my projector with a wobbly small cardboard box to raise it up. Not very professional looking. Quite disappointed. Next time I buy a car, I will double check that the 2 front tires are included. >:(
customer_reviews.author: Jacky G.

customer_reviews.title: I was really hoping for better sound directly from the projector but it's pretty muffled
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping for better sound directly from the projector but it's pretty muffled, and the wifi set up didn't work with a Mac (though other Epson models do). That said, the picture quality is really great for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Mossa

customer_reviews.title: I like it. It has everything that I need as ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It has everything that I need as far as support for multiple inputs as well as wireless connection to my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like new
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a man cave projector to watch sports and golf simulator.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great projector for a reasonable price. The wireless connection works perfectly. No doubts!!!
customer_reviews.author: elena calderon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great device, great in regular light. Crisp text and good color.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Vaillancourt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great for small churches that do not always use your projector except for certain events.
customer_reviews.author: George Goynes Jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great projector. Sharp picture. Mounted from ceiling and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This projector does absolutely everything I need it to do! I can show presentations in the afternoon and watch a movie that evening. I'm thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: A. Pennisi

customer_reviews.title: it is the best we have bought this far
customer_reviews.text: This is our third projector for church. Although refurbished, it is the best we have bought this far.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great price! worked really well in a conference of 300+ people.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great in a classroom setting with the overhead lights on. Easy set up and fast start up.
customer_reviews.author: dasmith

customer_reviews.title: very sad waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt have option to play with speakers from projector runs me a lot of problems when i dock phone through hdmi, i was really expecting a class A projector and i received a mediocre projector, when i have anything connected it sometimes goes red on me which means malfunction, its very disturbing since i wanted to go all in with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: noam

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is not built in wifi it comes with an external wifi card you plug in. Don't be fooled.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed in a projector: easy to set up and use. In fact: I was on site to do a presentation and I couldn't figure their projector out, so I pulled mine out and we were up and running instantly! Though I'm still looking forward to the days when a projector this powerful is much smaller, it's surprisingly light and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Suzan Czajkowski

customer_reviews.title: Wireless problems
customer_reviews.text: The wireless connection is too complicated to work. Could not work the wireless from the iPad, which was the reason for purchasing this version.
customer_reviews.author: Charles  Van Vliet

customer_reviews.title: The images are well projected, even during day light ...
customer_reviews.text: The images are well projected, even during day light. The only issue with it is password to connect it to wireless devices.
customer_reviews.author: Adetunji Olukayode Olawoye

customer_reviews.title: excellent projector
customer_reviews.text: The Epson EX5220 projector is very user friendly, good image quality. the wireless future work very good.We received the item in good condition

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the money. Turns on very and fast and up and running.
customer_reviews.author: simple and addictive. i like it and fun too. not to many games out in amazon but this one is worth it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Met my expectations. Have not used it much since acquiring it.

customer_reviews.text: On time, projector so far is working exceedingly well. Good job at Amazon, as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Dudley Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The Wireless Feature is awesome. The feature where you can straighten the picture on the screen while the projector is sitting at an angle (forgot the term) is super. I love this projector.
customer_reviews.author: E. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great picture but could never get wifi option to engage.

customer_reviews.title: Great projector
customer_reviews.text: This projector has made a huge difference in our Sunday morning church service. Highly recommended this projector for anyone and everyone.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for price. Easy to set up. Light weight and easy to carry
customer_reviews.author: Susan Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Good value projector
customer_reviews.text: This projector is fairly easy to use. Occasionally, it is a little complicated as far as having to adjust screen size. I use it for presentations and lectures and the lumens/brightness are very good even in a lit room. Overall, I think this is a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: animaldr

customer_reviews.title: i dont like the resolution
customer_reviews.text: i got this projector 2 weeks ago and i hooked with my computer. it look good from outside. the problem is when you watch movie and/or any games it just hold the video and ruin the whole show its like you are watching movie using scratched CD or DVD. for picture its not perfect but its good if its possible i would recommend to return because i have purchased another one with less price and high performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amrit

customer_reviews.title: Worked 3 times, Temp. sensor issues
customer_reviews.text: Bought this projector for my classroom since my school doesn't provide one. Used it 3 times and then when you turn it on the fan goes on high and the light flashes that it is overheated even though it wasn't turned on and not used for days; shuts itself off. Given my particular situation this really stinks and I can't buy a new one, wasted a lot of my own money which as a teacher isn't very much. :(
customer_reviews.author: Everette S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: EASY TO SET UP--EASY TO USE--EASY TO ADJUST WHAT MORE CAN YOU SAY?
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT WLAZNAK

customer_reviews.title: Priced Right
customer_reviews.text: Looked at a lot of projectors and this one seemed to hit all the points I needed. The only think I wish it had was external speaker jack as projector speaker are... well projector speakers and just not really high quality..

customer_reviews.title: This projector is difficult to set up on a network ...
customer_reviews.text: This projector is difficult to set up on a network and almost impossible to run wirelessly with a laptop It keeps not being able to find it's source. Won't buy one again. You need a PhD in engineering and even then it's hard.

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as expected. I could not possibly ask for anything more. It arrived right on time and worked perfectly and was very easy to use and set-up.

customer_reviews.title: Easy set-up.
customer_reviews.text: Unit was easy to set up, color is great. But the WI-FI module was hard. Still trying to get it to work.

customer_reviews.title: with every penny
customer_reviews.text: has AMAZING picture quality for a under 500$ projector. wireless features are awesome slide show presentation is crystal clear wireless hook up with computer is easy as 123 to set up. would highly recommend for bedroom basement office its all around a really nice product. make sure to buy protection plan on the bulb don't want to get stuck with the repair later on in the projectors life.

customer_reviews.title: Super bright and good clarity. Love the wireless connectivity.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our Church use. Love the wireless connectivity. Setting up the wireless was little confusing. But once you setup the wireless it works seamlessly. I didn't had any problem of wireless connectivity when it was around to 30 ft away from my laptop. I highly recommend this product.

customer_reviews.text: Great projector with many options. Mounted to the ceiling, works great with great picture quality

customer_reviews.title: Epson XGA 3LCD projector

customer_reviews.title: ... up was a hassle but besides that everything word amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Setting WiFi up was a hassle but besides that everything word amazing!

customer_reviews.title: Missing Items
customer_reviews.text: I ordered (3) of these projectors and none of them came with the soft carrying case, wireless module, USB-B, or remote control. Unfortunately, I am over the 30-day return policy and can do nothing about it but leave an awful review.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Wegner

customer_reviews.title: I have been trying to connect my projector to my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to connect my projector to my wireless network but after 2 days of failed intents I desisted.
customer_reviews.author: Lester Roca Pinero

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: Id receive the product with the "auto iris error" im asking for help trought Amazon a Epson.
customer_reviews.author: yessenia

product_meta.title: Epson EX5220 Wireless XGA 3LCD Projector, 3000 lumens (V11H551020)
product_meta.description: Style:ProjectorThe Epson EX5220 ensures compelling presentations. The EX5220 offers a fast wireless connection to your iPad, iPhone, AndroidTM tablet/smartphone2 and laptop. With convenient HDMI connectivity, it also delivers digital video and audio with just one cable. Plus, Epson's Simple Setup Suite, a host of innovative features, enables flexible positioning and rapid setup in any venue. It's the perfect solution for professionals whose presentations demand proven performance. Brilliant image quality requires high color brightness. Epson 3LCD projectors have 3x Brighter Colors than leading competitive projectors. Delivering 3000 lumens of color brightness and 3000 lumens of white brightness, the EX5220 uses 3LCD, 3-chip technology for brilliant images with true-to-life color.
